mapper.sql: id,parent_id,contract_name,contract_type,status,share_space,chain_code, region_code,join_time,DATE_FORMAT(join_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as join_time_str,start_date,DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_date_str, end_date,DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_date_str,xiaowei_code,create_code, create_name,create_time,org_code,org_name,org_type,group_id
mapper.select:
select
from z_contracts where contract_type !='10' and parent_id = #{id}

select
from z_contracts where contract_type ='10' and status = '1' and group_id is null

SELECT zc.`contract_name` AS contractName, zc.`org_code` AS nodeCode, zc.`org_name` AS nodeName, cf.`factor_name` AS targetName, cf.`factor_value` AS targetValue, cf.`factor_unit` AS targetUnit, rp.`title` AS planTitle, rpd.`content` AS planContent FROM z_contracts zc JOIN z_contracts_factor cf ON cf.`contract_id` = zc.`id` LEFT JOIN z_reserve_plan rp ON rp.`parent_id` = zc.`id` JOIN z_reserve_plan_detail rpd ON rpd.`parent_id` = rp.id where zc.parent_id = #{contractId} AND zc.contract_type = '30'

SELECT zc.`contract_name`, xw.`xwName`, cf.* FROM z_contracts_factor cf JOIN z_contracts zc ON cf.`contract_id` = zc.id JOIN sys_xiaowei_ehr xw ON zc.`xiaowei_code` = xw.`xwCode` WHERE cf.`contract_id` IN (SELECT t1.id FROM z_contracts t1 WHERE t1.contract_type = '20' AND t1.`parent_id` = #{contractId}) ORDER BY xwName, factor_code,factor_type

SELECT cf.`factor_code` AS factorCode, cf.`factor_name` AS factorName ,cf.`factor_unit` AS factorUnit, IF( cf.factor_unit = '%', FORMAT(SUM(cf.factor_value) / 2, 2), FORMAT(SUM(cf.factor_value), 2) ) AS factorValue FROM z_contracts_factor cf WHERE cf.factor_type='02' and cf.`contract_id` IN (SELECT t1.id FROM z_contracts t1 WHERE t1.contract_type = '20' AND t1.`parent_id` = #{contractId}) GROUP BY factor_code

SELECT cf.factor_code AS targetCode, cf.factor_name AS targetName, cf.factor_unit AS targetUnit FROM z_contracts_factor cf WHERE cf.`contract_id` IN (SELECT t1.id FROM z_contracts t1 WHERE t1.contract_type = '20' AND t1.`parent_id` = #{contractId}) GROUP BY factor_code;
